title: Budget Hotels Are Struggling. Wyndham’s CEO Sees Opportunity
summary: Wyndham holds about 30% of all U.S. branded economy hotels. CEO Geoff Ballotti said in an exclusive Skift interview that he's optimistic for the budget segment, despite the recent cost and demand pressures it's faced.
